:visible.description: Whether or not to display Dialog, with support for the .sync modifier
:visible.description_zh: 是否显示 Dialog，支持 .sync 修饰符

title.description: The title of the dialog can also be passed in via a named slot (see table below).
title.description_zh: Dialog 的标题，也可通过具名 slot （见下表）传入

fullscreen.description: Whether it is a full-screen dialog

top.description: The margin-top value in Dialog CSS
top.description_zh: Dialog CSS 中的 margin-top 值

modal.description: Whether a mask layer is required

modal-append-to-body.description: Whether the mask layer is inserted on the body element, if false, the mask layer is inserted on the parent element of the dialog
modal-append-to-body.description_zh: 遮罩层是否插入至 body 元素上，若为 false，则遮罩层会插入至 Dialog 的父元素上

append-to-body.description: Whether the dialog itself is inserted on the body element. Nested Dialogs must specify the property and assign it to true
append-to-body.description_zh: Dialog 自身是否插入至 body 元素上。嵌套的 Dialog 必须指定该属性并赋值为 true

lock-scroll.description: Whether to lock the body scroll when the dialog appears
lock-scroll.description_zh: 是否在 Dialog 出现时将 body 滚动锁定

close-on-click-modal.description: Is it possible to turn off Dialog by clicking on modal
close-on-click-modal.description_zh: 是否可以通过点击 modal 关闭 Dialog

close-on-press-escape.description: Is it possible to turn off the Dialog by pressing ESC
close-on-press-escape.description_zh: 是否可以通过按下 ESC 关闭 Dialog

show-close.description: Whether or not to display a close button

:before-close.description: The callback before closing pauses the closure of the dialog
:before-close.description_zh: 关闭前的回调，会暂停 Dialog 的关闭

center.description: Whether or not to have a centered layout for the head and bottom
center.description_zh: 是否对头部和底部采用居中布局

destroy-on-close.description: Destroys the element in the dialog when it is closed
destroy-on-close.description_zh: 关闭时销毁 Dialog 中的元素

events.name: opened
events.description: The dialog opens the callback at the end of the animation
events.description_zh: Dialog 打开动画结束时的回调

events.name: closed
events.description: Dialog closes the callback at the end of the animation
events.description_zh: Dialog 关闭动画结束时的回调

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Dialog 按钮操作区的内容
slots.description_zh: Dialog 按钮操作区的内容
